tam.description: Global AI software market ($60B) + Startup services market ($60B). AI assistant co-founders represent a subset of both markets, focusing on AI-enabled business solutions and startup support services.

sam.description: Serviceable Addressable Market includes startups and entrepreneurs using AI services, specifically those seeking co-founder-level AI assistance. This represents 30% of TAM.
key_constraints: High competition from existing startup tools
Need for trust and proven results

som.description: Serviceable Obtainable Market represents realistic market share achievable through targeted go-to-market strategies, focusing on early-stage startups and angel investors.
assumptions: Strong brand positioning in AI startup space

key_trends: Increased venture capital funding for AI startups
Remote work enabling global service delivery
disruption_risks: Large tech companies building in-house AI assistants
market_dynamics.timing: Now is the right time due to mature AI capabilities, increased startup funding, and growing recognition of AI's role in business operations
